B E S T    D E A L S   I N   N I G E R I A

provides advertisement and listings for local businesses organized by category and deals they offer. It currently offers a broad range of marketing tools including online presence, local search, display ads and direct marketing.

BestDealNaija - Your guide to the best deals, discounts and retail shopping experience in NIGERIA. BestDealNaija also serves as an advertisement and marketing hub for business owners to advertise their products and services.

BestDealNaija - Your guide to the best deals, discounts and retail shopping experience in NIGERIA. BestDealNaija also serves as an advertisement and marketing hub for business owners to advertise their products and services.
Drive traffic to business owners products, goods and services.
Directory and guide to businesses in NIGERIA.
Top ranking and visibility rating online.
Free social media and digital promotion.
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
Mojidi Street, Off Toyin Street, Ikeja, Lagos.
A N N U A L     O F F L I N E     S A L E S
The first of its kind pop-up sale initiative of Best Deal Naija
Bestdealnaija Trade Fair is our annual offline sales fair where sellers and business owners give their products and goods for sale at %50 percent discount. Call our rep to know more.

B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A

B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
<Field disabled={isOrderLoading} name='first_name' type='text' label='First name' placeholder='Enter first-name' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={isOrderLoading} name='last_name' type='text' label='Last name' placeholder='Enter last-name' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={auth || isOrderLoading} name='email' type='email' label='Email Address' placeholder='you@example.com' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={isOrderLoading} name='address' label='Billing Address' placeholder='Billing Address' component={CustomTextarea} required={true} />
<CustomSelectState name='state' label='State' placeholder='Select State' defaultValue={values.state} options={updatedStates} />
<CustomSelectCity name='city' label='City' placeholder='Select City' defaultValue={values.city} options={updatedCities(values.state && values.state.isoCode)} />
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
How do you want to pay for your order?
Stay Safe, go cashless with card
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A

When you create a Google Account, you provide us with personal information that includes your name and a password. You can also choose to add a phone number or payment information to your account. Even if you arent signed in to a Google Account, you might choose to provide us with information  like an email address to receive updates about our services. We also collect the content you create, upload, or receive from others when using our services. This includes things like email you write and receive, photos and videos you save, docs and spreadsheets you create, and comments you make on YouTube videos.
<CustomSelectBank disabled={isAuthenticating} name='bank_name' label='Bank Name' placeholder='Select Bank' defaultValue={values.bank_name} options={updatedBanks} />

<Field disabled={isAuthenticating} id='bank-acct-number'  name='bank_acct_number' placeholder='Enter Bank Account Number' type='text' label='Bank Account Number' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={isAuthenticating} name='address' placeholder='Enter Address' label='Address' component={CustomTextarea} required={true} />
<CustomSelectState disabled={isAuthenticating} name='state' label='State' placeholder='Select State' defaultValue={values.state} options={updatedStates} />
<CustomSelectCity disabled={isAuthenticating} name='city' label='City' placeholder='Select City' defaultValue={values.city} options={updatedCities(values.state ? values.state.isoCode : null)} />

<Field disabled={isAuthenticating} id='title'  name='title' placeholder='Enter Business Title' style={{ textTransform: 'capitalize' }} type='text' label='Business Title' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<CustomFileInput disabled={isAuthenticating} name='image_file' label='Business Image' onChange={(e) => onFileChange(e, { name: 'display_pics' })} readOnly={isAuthenticating} />
<Field disabled={isAuthenticating} name='description' placeholder='Enter Business Description' label='Business Description' component={CustomTextarea} required={true} />
Your request to be a vendor on BestDealNaija have been received. We will get back to you via the email address you provided when signing up.
B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
<Field disabled={isLoading} name='first_name' type='text' label='First name' placeholder='Enter first-name' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={isLoading} name='last_name' type='text' label='Last name' placeholder='Enter last-name' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={authProvider !== null || isLoading} name='email' type='email' label='Email Address' placeholder='you@example.com' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={isLoading} name='address' label='Billing Address' placeholder='Billing Address' component={CustomTextarea} required={true} />
<CustomSelectState name='state' label='State' placeholder='Select State' defaultValue={values.state} options={updatedStates} />
<CustomSelectCity name='city' label='City' placeholder='Select City' defaultValue={values.city} options={updatedCities(values.state ? values.state.isoCode : null)} />

B E S T     D E A L S     I N     N I G E R I A
<Field disabled={isLoading} name='old_password' type='password' label='Old Password' placeholder='Enter current password' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={isLoading} name='password' type='password' label='Password' placeholder='Enter new password' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
<Field disabled={isLoading} name='password_confirm' type='password' label='Confirm Password' placeholder='Confirm new password' component={CustomInput} required={true} />
